description.narrative: Danida Innovation & Business Explorer (DIBE) offers financial support to Danish companies, including start-ups, that wish to investigate concrete business opportunities contributing to the achievement of the Sustainable Development Goals and the Paris agreement. The project was successful, as Arla has on the basis of the fact-finding missions decided to set up local production of dairy products for the Nigerian market. The fact-finding missions conducted under Business Explorer provided data to an assessment of the need for technical as well as human capacity building.

The goal of this project is to set up a local production of dairy products under the DANO brand in Nigeria. To scope and access the business case, Arla will engage in two separate Danida Business Explorer fact finding missions. The purpose of the first fact finding mission is an assessment of suitable dairy processing facilities and innovative product development targeted West African consumers. To succeed with this business strategy, it requires substantial and careful planning. Funding from Danida Business Explorer will provide the means for this.
